charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1101_0100_2:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was out walking one day,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Bianca
standing idly in the middle of the path.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_0600_1:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It’s just you!
Sorry, I must have spaced out there for a minute.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_0700_1:
I just saw a team of three sync pairs pass by
on their way out to the field.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_0800_1:
They all looked so excited! I’ll bet they’re really
good friends.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_0900_1:
As I watched them walk past, a bunch of old
memories suddenly came back to me.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_0401_1100_1:
I was just remembering the day my two friends
and I set off from Nuvema Town together.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_0402_1300_1:
Yeah. I was just remembering the day my two
friends and I set off from Nuvema Town together.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_1400_1:
Our first Pokémon, our first big adventure...
Those were exciting times!
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_1500_1:
We took the first step of our journeys together
that day, and now the three of us are all on
paths of our own.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_1600_1:
I know they’re both giving it their all, so I’ve gotta
keep doing my best, too!
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_0401_1800_1:
Of course! I wouldn’t replace them for anything
in the world!
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_0402_2000_1:
I suppose so! We do whatever we can to raise
each other up, so I guess you could say we’re
friends AND rivals!
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_2100_1:
One of my friends even rescued Musharna once
when she was in a pinch.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_2200_1:
I’m sure both of them are ecstatic about Pokémon
battling here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_2300_1:
I’m pretty excited about joining a team and doing
some battling myself!
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_2400_1:
On Pasio, we get to have fun with our partners
and our friends, AND we get to mingle with all
sorts of other Trainers and Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_2500_1:
It’s the perfect opportunity to learn more about
Pokémon we haven’t been able to encounter yet.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_2600_1:
And the more we learn about Pokémon, the better
we’ll all get along together, don’t you think?
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_2700_1:
That’s the main goal of my research with
Professor Juniper. We’ll have to do our best to
study as much as we can!
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_0401_3000_1: Well, I can’t really be sure of what she said...
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_0402_3200_1: Well, I can’t really be sure of what she said...
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_3300_1:
But just now, Musharna let out some mist from
her forehead.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_3400_1:
It’s called Dream Mist because it’s said to be full
of all the dreams Musharna have eaten.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_3500_1:
If that’s true, then my dreams must be within
Musharna’s mist, too.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_3600_1:
So in a way, it sort of feels like she’s cheering on
my dreams!
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_3700_1:
I want to work hard and do whatever I can to
make them come true.
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_3800_1:
I want to be a bridge that helps connect people
and Pokémon to each other!
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_3900_1:
That’s why I’m so glad I came to Pasio. I really
feel like I’m one step closer to making it happen!
charaepi_ch0102_00_bell/2301_1201_4000_1:
Let’s follow our own paths and make our dreams
come true together, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
